title: 5.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Develop a Java program that calculates and displays the absolute difference between two user-entered numbers. The program should make use of the Math.abs() function from the Java Math class. The absolute difference between two numbers a and b is defined as ∣a−b∣. Your program should prompt the user to enter the two numbers and then display the absolute difference between them.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
